name: A high density agarose resin, crosslinked and alkylated with epichlorohydrin, followed by chemical binding of benzylamine. The agarose resin would be in the form of beads with a particle size of 100 to 300 um for not less than 90% of the particles.
FoodContactSubstance: A high density agarose resin, crosslinked and alkylated with epichlorohydrin, followed by chemical binding of benzylamine. The agarose resin would be in the form of beads with a particle size of 100 to 300 um for not less than 90% of the particles.
